data.message: Does anyone know how to reach out to FB via telephone? about accounts being hacked and the person that was hacked, their friends are starting to get weird messages. I can't find a number anywhere. I am a friend of someone that has their account hacked. Please help.

replies.message: Hi Sondra. If you think your friend's account may have been hacked, please tell them to go to the Hacked Accounts section to get immediate help. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1nDoqz1. Thanks. -Kate

He can't even get on FB, it knocks him out. We need some personal help. They deleted pictures and is using his name to lure others to access the hackers. I personally  know what to do when someone sends an suspicious   note or email. My son didn't. Can we talk to anyone.?
Yes I was having problems awhile ago from people from other states
